flawed_nl_solution:
The hunting season last 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 months
So he goes hunting 3*6=<<3*6=18>>18 times a year
That means he gets 18*2=<<18*2=36>>36 deers per year
So he catches 36*600=<<36*600=26100>>26100 pounds of deer a year
That means he keeps 26100/2=<<26100/2=13050>>13050 pounds of deer a year
#### 13050

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21600, not 26100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
